portfolio.title: iTinerary
portfolio.description: A full stack mobile application built for the final group project of the Northcoders software engineering bootcamp. iTinerary is a trip planning application which creates a customised list of activity recommendations for the user's holiday destination, based on their personal preferences, and creates a bespoke schedule for the user.
portfolio.tech: React Native, Expo, Javascript, Firebase, Firestore, Mapbox Api, axios, API Ninjas

portfolio.title: NCNews - Front end
portfolio.description: A Reddit-style news application which connects to the NCnews API (built during the back-end phase of this project) to allow users to browse and interact with articles and comments from the API.

portfolio.title: NCNews REST API
portfolio.description: A REST API for NCNews, which provides data for articles, topics, comments and users on multiple endpoints.
